item.title: 特斯拉 9,390 亿美元估值领先丰田的优势几乎消失殆尽
item.description: 两年半前，特斯拉公司的价值比世界第二大汽车制造商丰田汽车公司高出近 1 万亿美元。【原文：Two and a half years ago, Tesla Inc. was worth almost $1 trillion more than Toyota Motor Corp., the world’s second-most valuable automaker.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的迈克-威尔逊在 "谦卑 "周期中保持灵活
item.description:
他说，关键在于找到合适的交易和公司，而不是大的指数级调仓

。【原文：

It’s all about finding the right trades and companies, not big index-level calls, he says

】

item.title: 摩洛哥化肥巨头酝酿出售债券和化学品部门首次公开募股
item.description: 摩洛哥国有磷酸盐巨头正准备出售债券，并有可能将其化工业务上市，以筹集数十亿美元用于去碳化工作。【原文：Morocco’s state-owned phosphates giant is teeing up bond sales and could potentially list its chemicals business as part of efforts to raise billions of dollars for decarbonization efforts.】

item.title: 伊朗与巴基斯坦承诺促进贸易，寻求修补关系
item.description: 在这两个亚洲邻国今年年初发动致命军事打击之后，伊朗和巴基斯坦采取了修复关系的措施，两国在总统易卜拉欣-莱西（Ebrahim Raisi）高调访问期间签署了多项安全和经济合作协议。【原文：Iran and Pakistan took steps to repair relations after deadly military strikes by the two Asian neighbors early this year, with both countries signing multiple agreements on security and economic cooperation during a high-profile visit by President Ebrahim Raisi.】

item.title: SunPower 披露重报盈利计划后业绩下滑
item.description: 屋顶太阳能公司 SunPower Corp. 表示，由于误报了部分销售佣金，计划重报 2022 年和 2023 年的部分财务业绩，该公司股价暴跌。【原文：SunPower Corp. tumbled after the rooftop solar company said it plans to restate some financial results from 2022 and 2023 after misclassifying some sales commissions.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚银行业顶级买家认为并购交易驱动力放缓
item.description: 罗马尼亚最大的银行表示，在达成收购匈牙利 OTP Bank Nyrt 当地部门的交易后，它可能会放缓在黑海国家的收购狂潮。【原文：Romania’s largest bank said it’s likely to slow a buying spree in the Black Sea country after clinching a deal to acquire the local unit of Hungary’s OTP Bank Nyrt.】

item.title: 香港开发商考虑出售伦敦摩天大楼项目股权
item.description: 香港开发商丽新发展有限公司（Lai Sun Development Co.【原文：Hong Kong developer Lai Sun Development Co. is considering options for a planned office tower in the City of London, including a potential sale of a stake in the project.】

item.title: 与穆巴达拉打赌 2 亿美元后，库什纳瞄准赞普董事会
item.description: 由贾里德-库什纳（Jared Kushner）创立的私募股权公司 Affinity Partners 在今年早些时候投资了巴西快餐公司 Zamp SA 后，正在寻求为该公司董事会增添一名董事。【原文：Affinity Partners, the private equity firm founded by Jared Kushner, is seeking to add a director to the board of Brazil-based fast-food firm Zamp SA after investing in the company earlier this year.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司关注进口激增的南非燃料贸易
item.description: 法国石油巨头道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）计划扩大与南非的燃料贸易。【原文：French oil major TotalEnergies SE plans to expand fuel trade with South Africa after a wave of refinery shutdowns sent imports soaring.】

item.title: 丹格特自三月以来第三次下调尼日利亚燃油价格
item.description: 尼日利亚新的超大型炼油厂表示，将下调国内市场柴油和航空燃料的价格，这是该炼油厂自 3 月份开始供应这些产品以来第三次下调价格。【原文：Nigeria’s new mega refinery said it’s cutting the prices of diesel and aviation fuel in the domestic market, the third time since it started delivering the products in March.】

item.title: 纳格尔称，若数据证实经济预测，欧洲央行可降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，如果新的预测和新的数据证实消费者价格增长率将回到 2%，欧洲中央银行可以考虑降低借贷成本。【原文：The European Central Bank can envisage reducing borrowing costs if new forecasts and fresh data confirm consumer-price growth is headed back to 2%, Governing Council member Joachim Nagel said.】

item.title: Crypto.com 推迟进军韩国零售市场的计划
item.description: 就在计划扩大零售业务的前六天，加密货币交易所 Crypto.com 推迟了在韩国的上线时间，以便与监管机构进一步沟通。【原文：Just six days before its planned retail expansion, the crypto exchange Crypto.com postponed its launch in South Korea so it can communicate further with regulators.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉聘请罗斯柴尔德为违约债务顾问
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，委内瑞拉政府已聘请罗斯柴尔德公司（Rothschild & Co.【原文：Venezuela’s government has hired Rothschild & Co. as a financial adviser to provide an overview of its foreign debt obligations, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 希腊计划自 2021 年以来首次出售新的 30 年期债券
item.description: 希腊将出售新的 30 年期债券，以表明其在长达十年的债务危机后恢复金融正常。【原文：Greece is going to sell new 30-year bonds as it aims to signal its return to financial normality following a decade-long debt crisis.】

item.title: 匈牙利进一步放缓降息步伐，帮助锚定波动的福林
item.description: 匈牙利进一步放慢了下调欧盟最高关键利率的步伐，决策者们试图在风险更高的经济环境中锚定波动剧烈的福林。【原文：Hungary further slowed the pace of cuts to the European Union’s highest key interest rate, with policymakers seeking to anchor the volatile forint in a riskier economic environment.】

item.title: 巴西分析师上调今明两年主要利率预测
item.description: 在巴西央行改变了前瞻性指引并加强了对全球经济前景的警示之后，巴西分析师们上调了今明两年的基准利率预期。【原文：Brazil analysts lifted their benchmark interest rate estimates for this year and next after the central bank changed its forward guidance and stepped up alerts on the global economic outlook.】

item.title: 洛克希德-马丁公司盈利超出预期，并确认 2024 年展望
item.description: 洛克希德-马丁公司第一季度营业收入超出预期，因为该公司交付了更多的战斗机和导弹系统。【原文：Lockheed Martin Corp.’s first-quarter operating income beat expectations as it delivered more fighter jets and missile systems.】

item.title: 石油褪去中东恐惧溢价太快
item.description:
基准布伦特期货重回每桶87美元下方，但冲突仍对供应构成风险。【原文：

Benchmark Brent futures are back below $87 a barrel, but the conflict continues posing risks to supply.

】

item.title: 英国央行首席经济学家称对降息持谨慎态度
item.description: 英国央行首席经济学家休-皮尔（Huw Pill）表示，他在决定何时下调英国利率时持谨慎态度，称官员们需要继续警惕通胀持续存在的风险。【原文：Bank of England Chief Economist Huw Pill said he’s erring on the side of caution in deciding when to cut UK interest rates, saying officials need to remain on guard for risks that inflation persists.】

item.title: 炼油厂陷入困境，俄罗斯原油出口保持增长
item.description:
洪水和无人机对炼油厂的袭击可能有助于保持流量

。【原文：

Flooding and drone strikes on refineries likely help to keep flows elevated

】

item.title: 前外汇局局长称日本 "非常接近 "进行干预
item.description: 据日本一位前高级货币官员称，如果日元进一步走软，日本即将采取货币干预措施。【原文：Japan is on the brink of currency intervention if the yen weakens any further, according to one of the country’s former top currency officials.】

item.title: 迭戈-梅吉亚千禧基金计划在米兰设立办事处
item.description: 前千禧管理公司（Millennium Management）投资组合经理迭戈-梅吉亚（Diego Megia）的新对冲基金正在意大利设立办事处，与其他同行一起寻求利用欧洲国家提供的税收优惠政策。【原文：Former Millennium Management portfolio manager Diego Megia’s new hedge fund is setting up an office in Italy, joining peers seeking to take advantage of the tax incentives offered by the European country.】

item.title: 德国因房地产价值问题调查 "无瑕疵 "银行债券
item.description: 德国银行业监管机构 BaFin 正在对贷款人用于担保债券（即 Pfandbriefe）的不动产进行仔细审查，这是一个 4000 亿欧元的市场，传统上被认为是最安全的信贷市场之一。【原文：Germany’s banking watchdog BaFin is taking a closer look at the real estate used by lenders to secure covered bonds known as Pfandbriefe, a €400 billion market traditionally considered among the safest in credit.】

item.title: 中东忧虑缓解，新兴市场股市持续回升
item.description: 由于中东紧张局势似乎有所缓和，且欧洲经济体的数据显示经济活动更加强劲，新兴市场股市连续第二天上涨。【原文：Emerging-market stocks rose for a second day as the tensions in the Middle East appeared to ease and data from European economies showed stronger activity.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。股市反弹步伐加快，财报季拉开序幕，苹果公司在中国的 iPhone 销量大幅下滑。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. The rebound in stocks gathers pace, earnings season kicks into gear and Apple sees iPhone sales in China dive. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】

item.title: 第二艘滞留俄罗斯的埃及小麦船在等待三周后起航
item.description: 一艘埃及小麦船在等待正确手续三周后获准启航，因为俄罗斯最大的谷物贸易商之一与当地监管机构之间的纠纷继续扰乱出口。【原文：An Egyptian wheat ship has been allowed to sail after waiting three weeks for the correct paperwork, as a dispute between one of Russia’s top grain traders and a local regulator continues to disrupt exports.】

item.title: 反弹后中国买盘停滞，铜面临回调风险
item.description: 铜在接近每吨 10,000 美元的强劲涨势中面临考验，因为全球最大市场中国的买家对接近两年来最高点的价格望而却步。【原文：Copper’s powerful rally close to $10,000 a ton is facing a test as buyers in China, the world’s biggest market, balk at prices near their highest in two years.】

item.title: 石油期权显示地缘政治风险溢价正在迅速消退
item.description: 石油期权市场显示，交易商已经平仓了中东地区前所未有的导弹和无人机袭击所带来的一大笔地缘政治溢价。【原文：Oil options markets are indicating that traders have unwound a hefty chunk of the geopolitical premium stemming from unprecedented missile and drone attacks in the Middle East.】

item.title: 重组有望实现，美国银行发现乌克兰债券价值
item.description: 博雅证券公司（BofA Securities）的策略师认为，乌克兰的美元债券有明显的上涨空间，因为在美国 610 亿美元援助计划取得突破后，该国仍有望与债权人达成重组协议。【原文：Ukraine’s dollar bonds offer notable upside as the nation remains on track to agree a restructuring deal with creditors following a breakthrough on a $61 billion US aid package, according to strategists at BofA Securities.】

item.title: 奥伦进一步揭示其瑞士部门如何损失 4 亿美元
item.description: 波兰最大的企业 Orlen SA 石油公司更详细地说明了其设在瑞士的贸易部门是如何损失近 4 亿美元来购买从未兑现的石油的。【原文：Poland’s largest business, the oil company Orlen SA, set out a more detailed account of how it says its Swiss-based trading unit managed to lose almost $400 million purchasing oil that never materialized.】
